official_title: Intervention to Educate and Improve Underrepresented Populations' Participation in Clinical Trials
inclusion_criteria:
1. Provision to sign and date the consent form.
2. Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and be available for the duration of the study.
3. Be over 18 years old
4. English and/or Spanish Speaking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
